title: npm run build failed
body:
Hi i have a React application which is running fine on "npm start".
But when i try to create a build for prod deployment, its taking too long to prepare the build and finally error is thrown. 
Tried below options too:
1) re install the node modules
2) Cleared the cache
3) new install
and also tried
1) updating NPM to the latest version.
2) running the application form fresh folder with all new NPM installations.

nothing seems to be helpful to resolve the issue,
i am kind of stuck with this and any kind of Help or suggestions are really helpful and appreciated.

Error reported:
--------------------------
FATAL ERROR: CALL_AND_RETRY_LAST Allocation failed - JavaScript heap out of memory
------------------------------

Complete error details:
> light-bootstrap-dashboard-pro-react@1.0.0 build E:\Santosh\Remitrix\Web-UI\Remitrix_Datta
> npm run build-css && react-scripts build


> light-bootstrap-dashboard-pro-react@1.0.0 build-css E:\Santosh\Remitrix\Web-UI\Remitrix_Datta
> node-sass-chokidar --include-path ./src --include-path ./node_modules src/ -o src/

Wrote 2 CSS files to E:\Santosh\Remitrix\Web-UI\Remitrix_Datta\src\
